actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the provision of title 28 of the United States Code which deal with Federal tort claims to allow recovery in certain cases for injuries caused by the negligence of contractors performing services for the Government.

summary.text: Allows recovery for injuries caused by the negligence of contractors performing services for the Government under the Federal Tort Claims Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provision of title 28 of the United States Code which deal with Federal tort claims to allow recovery in certain cases for injuries caused by the negligence of contractors performing services for the Government.
